test-actions.ini-file:
[C-IANA] max_nodes = 75 childSpec = AFRINIC%1, APNIC%1, RIPE%1 max_depth = 3 serverName = rpki.bbn.com/rst breakAway = False subjkeyfile = ../templates/IANA.p15 ttl = 365
[C-AFRINIC] ipv4List = p%268435456 ipv6List = p%268435456 asList = r%536870912 childSpec = LIR%10, ROAA%1 serverName = afrinic.net breakAway = False ttl = 365
[C-APNIC] ipv4List = r%13, p%268435456, r%23, p%268435456 ipv6List = r%13, p%268435456, r%23, p%268435456 asList = r%536870912 childSpec = LIR%3, ROAA%1 serverName = apnic.net breakAway = False ttl = 365
[C-RIPE] ipv4List = r%13, p%268435456, r%23, p%268435456 ipv6List = r%13, p%268435456, r%23, p%268435456 asList = r%536870912 childSpec = LIR%5, ROAA%1 serverName = RIPE breakAway = False ttl = 365
[C-LIR] ipv4List = r%53, p%256 ipv6List = r%53, p%256 asList = r%128 childSpec = ROAA%2 serverName = lir.net breakAway = False ttl = 365
[R-ROAA] ipv4List = p%16 ipv6List = p%16 asList = r%4 serverName = roa.net breakAway = False ttl = 365 ROAipv4List = p%4, p%4 ROAipv6List = p%4, p%4 asid = 1
